electronic.description: array of the individual electronic convergences that happen as part for each ionic step

structure.description: array of changing structures as the ionic relaxation proceeds

iterations.description: number of total iterations of both the electronic and ionic steps

constraints.description: information about the type of constaints placed on the ionic relaxtion for cell size, shape, and atomic displacments

convergenceCriteria.description: criteria of the delta in total force before convergence is reached

energy.description: energy at the end of each ionic relaxation
